charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F  Felon in possession of a firearm

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922G.F  Felon in possession of a firearm

charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. - Defendant who having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, namely for the felony offense of Possession of a Controlled Substance, in Ector County, Texas, did  knowingly possess in and affecting commerce a firearm, to wit: a Taurus PT738 .380 caliber semi-automatic handgun, which had been shipped and transported in interstate and foreign  commerce, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Section 922(g)(1).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Revo Sentence: Defendant sentence to 8 months BOP, 2 years supervised release imposed Original Sentence: On 01/14/2016 the defendant was sentenced to 30 months BOP, 3 years Supervised Release and $100.00 Special Assessment.
